password.requirements.heading: Your password must contain:
validation.blocklist: {isValid, select, true {No forbidden words} other {Forbidden words "{blockedSubstrings}"}}
validation.charPool.numberChars.max: {max, plural, one {Use a maximum of one number} other {Use a maximum of {max} numbers}}
validation.charPool.numberChars.min: {min, plural, one {Use at least one number} other {Use at least {min} numbers}}
validation.charPool.specialChars.max: {max, plural, one {Use a maximum of one special character} other {Use a maximum of {max} special characters}}
validation.charPool.specialChars.min: {min, plural, one {Use at least one special character} other {Use at least {min} special characters}}
validation.length.max: {max, plural, one {Maximum one character} other {Maximum {max} characters}}
validation.length.min: {min, plural, one {Minimum length of one character} other {Minimum length of {min} characters}}
validation.regex.max: Pattern "{pattern}" may not be used more than {max}
